data.meta_description: From the Producer of Harry Potter and Paddington, The Secret Garden shot at Pinewood Studios on F stage and M Stage and is in cinemas today. Pinewood was also‚Ä¶
data.text:
Disney invites you to return to the story that started it all üçé Experience 'Snow White', only in cinemas March 21, 2025 #ShotAtPinewood

‚ÄòI‚Äôm Batman‚Äô was first heard in UK cinemas 35 years ago when Tim Burton‚Äôs Batman was released #OnThisDay in 1989. The production #ShotAtPinewood using seven stages and almost the entirety of Pinewood‚Äôs then 95-acre backlot for Gotham City.

25 years ago today, The Stanley Kubrick Building was opened by Christiane Kubrick at Pinewood Studios and dedicated to the memory of the iconic director, writer, producer, and photographer who #ShotAtPinewood with 'Full Metal Jacket' and 'Eyes Wide Shut' and #ShotAtShepperton the sci-fi epic '2001: A Space Odyssey' and 'Dr. Strangelove'.

A HUGH-ge thrill to have had Ryan Reynolds, Hugh Jackman, Director Shawn Levy and the cast and crew of 'Deadpool & Wolverine' call #PinewoodStudios home during filming #ShotAtPinewood

The backlot at Pinewood was converted into a classic slice of small-town American life for 'Supergirl', released #OnThisDay 40 years ago in UK cinemas. #ShotAtPinewood it was, at the time, one of the largest exterior sets built at the studio. A spin-off to the 'Superman' film series, which also shot at the Studios, it starred Helen Slater and Faye Dunaway and featured multiple outdoor flying sequences.

Three Pinewood Post Legends, John Hayward, Nick Le Messurier and Graham V. Hartstone, were back at the Studios last week to pay their respects to former colleague and Pinewood Re-Recording Mixer Otto Snel. All worked together on the original #BladeRunner Image 1: Left to Right, Nick Le Messurier, Graham V. Hartstone and John Hayward, checking out the newly refurbished Pressburger Theatre (formerly Theatre 2) where the original film was mixed. Image 2: Otto Snel in Theatre 2 seated in front of the Theatre Projects mixing console used for #BladeRunner. #PinewoodPost

Get ready for quips vs claws this summer! Our #DeadpoolAndWolverine billboard is on display at the Studios where the production #ShotAtPinewood. In UK cinemas from 25 July.
